attributes.additional_details:
To allow the unhindered regeneration and development of Manston Airport into its capability to become a fully operational international hub, for the benefit and sustainable growth of the local economy both in financial income, employment, and future prosperity.

Also, this is a more viable alternative to Gatwick, Heathrow and any other proposed future development in other areas due to the existence of Manston itself today and the investment already undertaken to date in infrastructure etc.
